content.rendered:
Medical Lab Tech (MLT) | Broken Arrow, Oklahoma
  • Must have 1+ year MLT experience
  • Current MLT certification in good standing
  • Will analyze clinical laboratory specimens following all correct techniques
  • Compensation is DOE
